## About NHSquicker

NHSquicker is a **free app** which provides **live wait times **for NHS services in **Devon, Cornwall and Somerset**. It was created to help people make **smarter healthcare choices** and reduce unnecessary pressure on the NHS.
:::

### Why it matters

A&E waiting times have increased substantially over recent years, leading to longer waits and increased strain on emergency services.

### How NHSquicker helps


-   **Choose the right service**: guides users to the most appropriate healthcare service for them

-   **Reduce pressure on the NHS:** helps prevent unnecessary visits to A&E

-   **Save time**: uses can see live wait times and plan their visits accordingly

NHSquicker enables **faster, smarter healthcare choices** for people, while helping the NHS run more efficiently.
